field.name: summary
field.value: AmbiguousMatch exception when querying properties from NHibernate-enabled objects

field.name: description
field.value:
When using NHibernate on an object model, querying an instance triggers an AmbiguousMatchException.
Some debugging learns that the ambiguous match arises from the fact that the object contains both its real properties, as the NHibernate proxied versions.
The problem does _not_ arise when looping over a fetched collection of those instances (might make sense for those into it :) )
I have no code at hand here, but let me know if you need it to reproduce this issue, then I'll have a look at it later.
